content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 24}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft light_gray_concrete_powder, I need to place 1 light_gray_dye, 4 sand and 4 gravel in the crafting grid. The light_gray_dye is currently in slot 36, so I will move it to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 24}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I will now move one of the four gravels from slot 37 to the slot next to the dye (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 2 with quantity 1
